title: 1103 15 "Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!"Transliteration: "Chichi o Modose! Hakanaki Bonī no Negai!" (Japanese:父を戻せ！儚きボニーの願い！) Katsumi Tokoro Jin Tanaka Kazuya Hisada May 5, 2024(2024-05-05) 2.6%[19]
transformers_text:
1103 15 "Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!"Transliteration: "Chichi o Modose! Hakanaki Bonī no Negai!" (Japanese:父を戻せ！儚きボニーの願い！) Katsumi Tokoro Jin Tanaka Kazuya Hisada May 5, 2024(2024-05-05) 2.6%[19]

Kaku and Zoro engage in a battle after Kaku fails to destroy the Thousand Sunny. Bonney pursues Dr. Vegapunk, demanding answers about Kuma. The Kid Pirates arrive at Elbaf. Meanwhile, Garp makes his way to G-14 to announce his rescue mission to retrieve Koby.
